attributes.review: Do NOT download! If you find yourself downloading it, terrible things can happen to you! For instance, I downloaded it and felt a deep pain in my chest and heart area! I of course rushed to the emergency room and the doctor told me that I had a heart attack! I thought nothing of it being connected to the app at first but then as I tried to open the app again, a hot air balloon came crashing down out of the sky and landed on me! Luckily everyone in it was ok but unfortunately I was not. My granddaughter is typing this because most of my body is paralyzed. I made one more attempt to open the app which caused me to finally know the app was causing these terrible things. As I opened the app for the 3rd and now final time... my *private area* shrunk. I went from the length the ladies would drop their jaws too.... to almost nonexistent. Just barely there to do my business. The doctors talked about naming this trump syndrome but I donâ€™t think he will be happy.
